Paper.PaperType: Write your answer here, e.g., research or demo
Paper.PaperID: Write the paper ID allocated to your paper in EasyChair
Paper.Title: Write the title of the paper here. It must match the paper title in EasyChair and the camera ready version
Paper.Authors: Write the full names of all authors in the order they appear in the camera ready version. The names must be separated by a comma
Paper.CorrespondingAuthor: Write the name of the corresponding author
Paper.CorrespondingAuthorEmail: Write the email address of the corresponding author
